dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: OMG, can you believe Dr. G cancelled class on us again yesterday?  I was stranded at school for hours!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Why didn’t you just run home, Agni?

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Not everyone’s a speedster like you, Ryker!  Well, he better not have cancelled class again or I’m gonna flip!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Holy crap!  You just about gave me a heart attack, Kitty!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Hey, so… does something seem odd to you guys today?

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Oh, hell no!  There’s no way you’re cancelling class again!

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: We have to go after him!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Shouldn’t we let the real heroes deal with this?
